title: >>> DODGEBALL 63 Invasion ADDRESS
body_text:
"Usually at this time of the week, I am creating a logo for a forthcoming event, thinking of what I could write for a future preview, etc. Basically, the norms of running the website.
However, it has come to my attention on numerous occasions on the very website you, the dodgeball crew, read that there is some sort of planned, even pre-meditated "invasion" if you will coming up in less than two weeks at DODGEBALL 63.
For the first time in this year-plus journey, I can honestly say I have no idea what's going on. All of the comments left on past entries have remained anonymous to this day. I have asked a few peeps already and they too are just as confused as I.
So what's the point of this 2-minute rant?
I am asking for your help.
If these supposed athletes want to step onto the court we made famous, then I need back-up. If anyone has any questions or more so concerns, I'll do the best I can to help you. But I cannot gaurantee answers because even I am still asking the questions.
DODGEBALL 62 is the next event coming to you this Saturday night, November 4th. Then, it's the supposed "invasion" from the outside world at DODGEBALL 63. Mark down
November 11th
on your calendars.
I will post another address real soon."
JOHN TRONOLONE
12:13am
October 31st, 2006
body_html:
"Usually at this time of the week, I am creating a logo for a forthcoming event, thinking of what I could write for a future preview, etc. Basically, the norms of running the website.

However, it has come to my attention on numerous occasions on the very website you, the dodgeball crew, read that there is some sort of planned, even pre-meditated "invasion" if you will coming up in less than two weeks at DODGEBALL 63.

For the first time in this year-plus journey, I can honestly say I have no idea what's going on. All of the comments left on past entries have remained anonymous to this day. I have asked a few peeps already and they too are just as confused as I.

So what's the point of this 2-minute rant?

I am asking for your help. If these supposed athletes want to step onto the court we made famous, then I need back-up. If anyone has any questions or more so concerns, I'll do the best I can to help you. But I cannot gaurantee answers because even I am still asking the questions.

DODGEBALL 62 is the next event coming to you this Saturday night, November 4th. Then, it's the supposed "invasion" from the outside world at DODGEBALL 63. Mark down November 11th on your calendars.

I will post another address real soon."

JOHN TRONOLONE
12:13am
October 31st, 2006
